<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Attached herewith as Exhibit 99.1 is a press release, dated September&nbsp;22, 2010, whereby Acergy S.A.
(the &#147;Company&#148;) announced the publication of the notice of Extraordinary General Meeting (EGM) and supporting materials, including the prospectus relating to the proposed combination between the Company and Subsea 7 Inc. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Notice of EGM and supporting materials, including the prospectus can be found on the Company&#146;s website:
www.acergy-group.com/public/AcergySubsea7combination </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The EGM of shareholders will be held on Tuesday November&nbsp;9, 2010 at 12:00 p.m.
local time at the offices of SGG S.A., 412F, route d&#146;Esch, L-2086 Luxembourg. All shareholders of record as of September&nbsp;21, 2010 will be entitled to vote. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The purpose of the EGM is to consider and approve the Combination with Subsea 7, and to amend the Company&#146;s Articles of Incorporation, with effect
from Completion, including increasing the authorised share capital of the Company and changing the name of the Company to &#147;Subsea 7 S.A.&#148;; and to appoint the new Directors of the Company as from Completion. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The notice of the EGM will be distributed to eligible shareholders no later than September&nbsp;30, 2010. The deadline for submission of votes for
holders of American Depositary Shares (ADSs) is Friday October&nbsp;29, 2010 and for holders of Common Shares Tuesday November&nbsp;2, 2010. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Attached herewith as Exhibits 99.2, 99.3, 99.4, 99.5, 99.6, 99.7, 99.8, respectively, are the following materials regarding the EGM: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">99.2 Chairman&#146;s letter dated September&nbsp;21, 2010 inter alia advising of the EGM. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">99.3 Notice of the Meeting on November&nbsp;9, 2010. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">99.4 Letter from DnB NOR Bank ASA to Shareholders of the Company regarding voting using the proxy card attached thereto. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">99.5 Blank form of Proxy Card for holders of Common Shares of the Company. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">99.6 Depositary&#146;s Notice (of Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas) re the EGM of Acergy S.A. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">99.7 Blank form of Proxy Card for holders of American Depositary Shares. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">99.8 Prospectus, dated September&nbsp;21, 2010 relating to the Combination </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The EGM materials are being mailed by Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to all holders of ADSs (each of which represents one common share of the
Company) of record as of September&nbsp;21, 2010. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Certain statements set forth above and contained in the materials furnished pursuant to
this Form 6-K may include &#147;forward-looking statements&#148; within the meaning of Section&nbsp;27A of the Securities Act of 1933 and Section&nbsp;21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. These statements may be identified by the use of words
like &#147;anticipate,&#148; &#147;believe,&#148; &#147;estimate,&#148; &#147;expect,&#148; &#147;intend,&#148; &#147;may,&#148; &#147;plan,&#148; &#147;forecast,&#148; &#147;project,&#148; &#147;will,&#148; &#147;should,&#148; &#147;seek,&#148; and
similar expressions. These forward-looking statements include, but are not limited to, statements as to the date and purpose of the EGM, the date for shareholders to be on the record in order to be entitled to vote, the date of distribution of
materials to eligible shareholders, the deadline for submission of votes, the expected completion of the Combination and the timing thereof, the benefits of the proposed Combination, the listing of the shares issued in the Combination, the directors
and management of the combined company after the Combination, the name and registered offices of the combined company after the Combination, the expected accounting treatment of the Combination, the business prospects and trading outlook for the
Company, Subsea 7 and the combined company, the effect of the Combination on the Company&#146;s and Subsea 7&#146;s indebtedness and guarantees and other matters relating to the completion and effects of the Combination. The forward-looking
statements reflect our current views and assumptions and are subject to risks and uncertainties. The following factors, and others which are discussed in our public filings and submissions with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, are among
those that may cause actual and future results and trends to differ materially from our forward-looking statements: actions by regulatory </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 99.1 </B></FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right">

<IMG SRC="g101282ex99_1pg1.jpg" ALT="LOGO"> </P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Acergy S.A. Announces Extraordinary General Meeting </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>London, England &#150; September&nbsp;22, 2010 </B>&#150; Acergy S.A. (NASDAQ-GS: ACGY; Oslo Stock Exchange: ACY) today announced the publication of
the notice of Extraordinary General Meeting (EGM) and supporting materials, including the prospectus. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Notice of EGM and supporting
materials, including the prospectus can be found on Acergy&#146;s website: www.acergy-group.com/public/AcergySubsea7combination </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The EGM of
shareholders will be held on Tuesday November&nbsp;9, 2010 at 12:00 p.m. local time at the offices of SGG S.A., 412F, route d&#146;Esch, L-2086 Luxembourg. All shareholders of record as of September&nbsp;21, 2010 will be entitled to vote.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The purpose of the EGM is to consider and approve the Combination with Subsea 7, and to amend the Company&#146;s Articles of Incorporation,
with effect from Completion, including increasing the authorised share capital of the Company and changing the name of the Company to &#147;Subsea 7 S.A.&#148;; and to appoint the new Directors of the Company as from Completion. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The notice of the EGM will be distributed to eligible shareholders no later than September&nbsp;30, 2010. The deadline for submission of votes for
holders of American Depositary Shares is Friday October&nbsp;29, 2010 and for holders of Common Shares Tuesday November&nbsp;2, 2010. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">************************************************************************************************************ </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Acergy S.A. is a seabed-to-surface engineering and construction contractor to the offshore oil and gas industry worldwide. We provide integrated services,
and we plan, design and deliver complex projects in harsh and challenging environments. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">************************************************************************************************************ </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Contact: </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Karen Menzel </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Acergy S.A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">+44 (0)20 8210 5568 </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>karen.menzel@acergy-group.com </U></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">www.acergy-group.com </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">If you no longer wish to
receive our press releases please contact: <U>karen.menzel@acergy-group.com</U> </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Forward-Looking Statements</B>: Certain statements made in
this announcement may include &#147;forward-looking statements&#148; within the meaning of Section&nbsp;27A of the Securities Act and Section&nbsp;21E of the US Securities Exchange Act of 1934. These statements may be identified by the use of words
like &#147;anticipate,&#148; &#147;believe,&#148; &#147;estimate,&#148; &#147;expect,&#148; &#147;intend,&#148; &#147;may,&#148; &#147;plan,&#148; &#147;forecast,&#148; &#147;project,&#148; &#147;will,&#148; &#147;should,&#148; &#147;seek,&#148; and
similar expressions. These forward-looking statements include, but are not limited to, statements as to the date of the EGM, the date for shareholders to be on the record in order to be entitled to vote, the purpose of the EGM, the date of
distribution of materials to eligible shareholders and the deadline for submission of votes. The forward-looking statements reflect our current views and assumptions and are subject to risks and uncertainties. The following factors, and others which
are discussed in our public filings and submissions with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, are among those that may cause actual and future results and trends to differ materially from our forward-looking statements: actions by regulatory
authorities or other third parties; unanticipated costs and difficulties related to the integration of Acergy S.A. and Subsea 7 Inc. and our ability to achieve benefits therefrom; unanticipated delays, costs and difficulties related to the
combination transaction, including satisfaction of closing conditions; our ability to recover costs on significant projects; the general economic conditions and competition in the markets and businesses in which we operate; our relationship with
significant clients; the outcome of legal proceedings or governmental enquiries; uncertainties inherent in operating internationally; the timely delivery of ships on order and the timely completion of ship conversion programmes; the impact of laws
and regulations; and operating hazards, including spills and environmental damage. Many of these factors are beyond our ability to control or predict. Given these factors, you should not place undue reliance on the forward-looking statements.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">This communication does not constitute an offer to purchase, sell, or exchange or the solicitation of an offer to sell, purchase, or exchange
any securities of Subsea 7 or Acergy. </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 99.2 </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%"></TD>

<TD WIDTH="47%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Acergy S.A.</B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">c/o Acergy M.S. Limited</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">200 Hammersmith Road,</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">London W6 7DL, United Kingdom</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">T: +44 (0)20 8210 5500 F: +44 (0)20 8210 5501</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">www.acergy-group.com</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="right">


<IMG SRC="g101282ex99_2pg1-4.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
</TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">September&nbsp;21, 2010 </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Dear Shareholder, </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I><U>Combination of Acergy
S.A. and Subsea 7 Inc.: </U></I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">On June&nbsp;21, 2010, Acergy announced that its Board of Directors had agreed with the Board of Directors of
Subsea 7 Inc. to combine the two companies. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Both Boards believe that the proposed combination of the business of Acergy S.A. with that of
Subsea 7 Inc. (the &#147;Combination&#148;) will create a global leader in seabed-to-surface engineering and construction with a presence in all major offshore oil and gas regions and the ability to provide clients a step-change in service offering.
Following the Combination, the Combined Group (as defined in the enclosed prospectus) should be better able to meet the growing size and technical complexity of offshore projects, driven by the demand to access ever more remote reserves in
increasingly harsh environments, and should be well positioned to take advantage of future growth opportunities in the offshore market globally. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Boards believe that the Combination represents an excellent strategic fit, with industry fundamentals strongly supporting the logic of combining the
two companies. The complementary fit of the different strengths and the enhanced operational capability should allow the Combined Group to deliver enhanced long-term value. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Combination will lead to the formation of a new group offering a broader spectrum of services to its customers and with the benefit of access to a
well diversified fleet. Employing around 12,000 people, the Combined Group will also be able to offer clients a greater breadth of project management, engineering, technical expertise and high-value technologies. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Combined Group will have a stronger balance sheet and should be better able to deliver efficiencies, including those arising from economies of scale,
capital deployment and optimisation of fleet schedules. Acergy and Subsea 7 believe that the Combination will give rise to substantial operating cost and vessel fleet synergies. These synergies are expected to deliver at least $100m per annum within
three years of completion. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" ALIGN="center">

<TR>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="right"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Page 1 of 4 </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>



 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right">

<IMG SRC="g101282ex99_2pg1-4.jpg" ALT="LOGO"> </P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Acergy S.A. and Subsea 7 Inc. have entered into a business combination agreement (the &#147;Combination
Agreement&#148;), which is summarised in the enclosed prospectus. Under the terms of the Combination Agreement, Subsea 7 Inc. will, on completion of the Combination, become a wholly owned subsidiary of Acergy S.A. and Acergy S.A. will be renamed
&#145;Subsea&nbsp;7 S.A.&#146;. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Assuming that all conditions precedent are either satisfied or waived, Acergy S.A. and Subsea 7 Inc.
currently expect that the Combination will become effective following clearance from certain anti-trust authorities, which is expected to be received by the end of 2010 or in the first quarter of 2011. Immediately after the Combination becomes
effective and based on the number of shares outstanding in both companies as at August&nbsp;31, 2010, it is anticipated that former Acergy S.A. shareholders will hold approximately 54% of the Combined Group&#146;s outstanding share capital.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I><U>Extraordinary General Meeting</U>: </I></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">An Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders (the &#147;Meeting&#148;) of Acergy S.A. (the &#147;Company&#148;) will be held on Tuesday
November&nbsp;9, 2010 at 12.00 p.m. (local time) at the offices of SGG S.A., 412F, route d&#146;Esch, L-2086 Luxembourg to consider certain resolutions relating to the Combination. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I><U>The Resolutions: </U></I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Combination
cannot be effected unless, among other requirements, Acergy S.A.&#146;s shareholders pass the resolutions which are to be considered at the Meeting. The resolutions, which are set out in the attached notice convening the Meeting, are as follows:
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(1) To approve the Combination with Subsea 7, and accordingly to increase the authorised share capital of the Company to $900m and,
conditional upon and with effect from Completion (as defined in the enclosed prospectus), to restate the Company&#146;s Articles of Incorporation, as set out in the prospectus, including changing the name of the Company to &#147;Subsea 7 S.A.&#148;;
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(2) To appoint Mr Kristian Siem, Sir Peter Mason KBE, Mr Jean Cahuzac, Mr Mel Fitzgerald, Mr Dod Fraser, Mr Arild Schultz, Mr Allen L Stevens
and Mr Trond Westlie as the Directors of the Company as from Completion. Additionally, to appoint a ninth Director jointly identified by the Chairmen of Acergy S.A. and Subsea 7 Inc. and proposed for appointment at the Extraordinary General Meeting.
Mr Kristian Siem, Sir Peter Mason KBE, Mr Jean Cahuzac, Mr Mel Fitzgerald and such ninth Director to serve for an initial term expiring at the annual general meeting to be held not less than 12 months after Completion, and the initial term of the
remaining directors to expire at the then following annual general meeting. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Page 2 of 4 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>



 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right">

<IMG SRC="g101282ex99_2pg1-4.jpg" ALT="LOGO"> </P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Resolution 1, approving the Combination, the increase in the Company&#146;s authorised share capital,
and the restating of the Company&#146;s Articles of Incorporation, requires a quorum of 50% of the outstanding share capital of Acergy S.A. to be present or represented. If this quorum is not achieved, a second Meeting will be convened and held, at
which there will be no quorum requirement. Resolution 1 requires the approval of two-thirds of the votes cast at the relevant Meeting. If the Meeting needs to be re-convened for lack of quorum, votes cast at the first Meeting would be carried over
to the second Meeting, although shareholders would be able to change their votes if they so wish. At the second Meeting, approval of at least two-thirds of the votes cast at the Meeting will be the only requirement for this resolution to be
approved. A copy of the proposed restated Articles of Incorporation, referred to in Resolution 1, showing the recommended changes, is annexed to the enclosed prospectus. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Resolution 2 proposes that a new Board of Directors of the Company be appointed in place of the existing Board as from and subject to Completion. Four of
the proposed Directors are currently directors of Acergy S.A. and four are currently Directors of Subsea 7 Inc. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In addition, it is a
requirement of the Combination Agreement that, at Completion, there be a ninth Director, who shall be independent. The Chairmen of Acergy S.A. and Subsea 7 Inc. will jointly agree the identity of the ninth Director. At the date of this letter, the
identity of the ninth Director is yet to be agreed, and a candidate will be proposed at a later date for appointment at the Meeting or at a further General Meeting of the Company. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I><U>Voting Recommendation: </U></I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Acergy
S.A.&#146;s Board of Directors has reviewed and considered the terms and conditions of the Combination. Based on their review, the Board has determined that the Combination, and the transactions relating to it, are in the best interests of both
Acergy S.A. and its shareholders. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Consequently, the Board of Directors of Acergy S.A. unanimously recommends that shareholders vote in
favour of both of the resolutions which will be considered at the Meeting.</B> The enclosed prospectus, and the documents incorporated by reference therein, contain information about Acergy and Subsea 7 and certain pro forma information on the
Combined Group, as well as the </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Page 3 of 4 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>



 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right">

<IMG SRC="g101282ex99_2pg1-4.jpg" ALT="LOGO"> </P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
legal requirements for the implementation of the Combination. We encourage you to read the prospectus and these documents carefully before voting, including the section entitled &#145;Risk
Factors&#146;. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Note that, unless both of the proposed resolutions are approved at the Meeting, and the ninth Director&#146;s appointment
is confirmed by a General Meeting, the terms agreed for effecting the Combination will not be fulfilled and the Combination may not proceed. It is therefore important that shareholders vote for both of the resolutions if they are in favour of the
Combination. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Board of Subsea 7 Inc. has also unanimously agreed to recommend the Combination to its shareholders. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I><U>Action Required: </U></I></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B>Enclosed
with this letter, along with the prospectus, are the Notice of Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders and the Proxy Card. If you wish your shares to be voted at the Meeting, but do not intend to attend in person, please promptly fill in,
sign, date and return the Proxy Card to ensure that it will be received in time. <B>The deadline for submission of votes for holders of American Depositary Shares is Friday October&nbsp;29, 2010 and for holders of Common Shares Tuesday
November&nbsp;2, 2010. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">If you require further information or clarification on the above, please contact Karen Menzel, our Group Manager,
Investor Relations at karen.menzel@acergy-group.com. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Your vote is very important. The Company&#146;s Board of Directors recommends that
you vote in favour of both of the resolutions to be considered at the Meeting. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Yours sincerely </FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px">

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>OF SHAREHOLDERS ON NOVEMBER 9, 2010 </U></B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders (the &#147;Meeting&#148;) of Acergy S.A. (the &#147;Company&#148;), a <I>Soci&eacute;t&eacute; Anonyme
Holding</I> R.C.S. Luxembourg B 43172 having its Registered Office at 412F, route d&#146;Esch, L-2086 Luxembourg, will be held at the offices of SGG S.A., 412F, route d&#146;Esch, L-2086 Luxembourg, on Tuesday November&nbsp;9, 2010 at 12.00 p.m.
(local time) for the following purposes: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(1) To approve the Combination with Subsea 7, and accordingly to increase the authorised share
capital of the Company to $900m and, conditional upon and with effect from Completion (as defined in the enclosed prospectus), to restate the Company&#146;s Articles of Incorporation, as set out in the prospectus, including changing the name of the
Company to &#147;Subsea 7 S.A.&#148;; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(2) To appoint Mr Kristian Siem, Sir Peter Mason KBE, Mr Jean Cahuzac, Mr Mel Fitzgerald, Mr Dod
Fraser, Mr Arild Schultz, Mr Allen L Stevens and Mr Trond Westlie as the Directors of the Company as from Completion. Additionally, to appoint a ninth Director jointly identified by the Chairmen of Acergy S.A. and Subsea 7 Inc. and proposed for
appointment at the Extraordinary General Meeting. Mr Kristian Siem, Sir Peter Mason KBE, Mr Jean Cahuzac, Mr Mel Fitzgerald and such ninth Director to serve for an initial term expiring at the annual general meeting to be held not less than 12
months after Completion, and the initial term of the remaining directors to expire at the then following annual general meeting. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">It is a
requirement of the Combination Agreement that, at Completion, there be a ninth Director, who shall be independent. The Chairmen of Acergy S.A. and Subsea 7 Inc. will jointly agree the identity of the ninth Director. At the date of this notice, the
identity of the ninth Director is yet to be agreed, and a candidate will be proposed at a later date for appointment at the Meeting or at a further General Meeting of the Company. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Details of the proposed Combination are set out in the prospectus which accompanies this Notice. The full text of the Articles of Incorporation, showing
the proposed amendments (including to the Company&#146;s objects), is annexed to the prospectus. The approval of the new Articles of Incorporation includes an authorisation of the Board of </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>



 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right">

<IMG SRC="g101282ex99_3pg1-2.jpg" ALT="LOGO"> </P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
Directors to suspend preferential subscription rights of existing shareholders. Biographies of the directors proposed for appointment are also set out in the prospectus. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Unless both of the proposed resolutions are approved and the ninth Director&#146;s appointment confirmed by a General Meeting, the terms agreed for
effecting the Combination will not be fulfilled and the Combination may not proceed. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Meeting shall be conducted in conformity with
the voting requirements of Luxembourg Company Law and the Company&#146;s Articles of Incorporation. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Board of Directors has determined
that Shareholders of record at the close of business on Tuesday September&nbsp;21, 2010 will be entitled to vote at the aforesaid Meeting and any adjournments thereof. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>The Company&#146;s Board of Directors recommends that you vote in favour of both of the resolutions to be considered at the Meeting. </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Yours sincerely </FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px">

<IMG SRC="g101282ex99_3pg2b.jpg" ALT="LOGO"> </P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Sir Peter Mason K.B.E. </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Chairman </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>For and on behalf of the
Board of Directors of Acergy S.A. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">September&nbsp;21, 2010 </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>To assure your representation at the Extraordinary General Meeting you are hereby requested to fill in, sign, date and return the Proxy Card delivered
herewith in the return envelope provided for such purpose. The deadline for submission of votes for holders of American Depositary Shares is Friday October&nbsp;29, 2010 and for holders of Common Shares Tuesday November&nbsp;2, 2010. The giving of
such proxy will not affect your right to revoke such proxy or vote in person should you later decide to attend the Meeting. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Extraordinary General Meeting, November&nbsp;9, 2010 </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The undersigned hereby authorise DnB NOR Bank ASA to constitute and appoint Sir Peter Mason KBE, Jean Cahuzac, Simon Crowe, Johan Rasmussen, Alistair
Peel, Jean Hoss, Philippe Hoss, Chantal Mathu, or the Chairman of the Extraordinary General Meeting (if not one of the aforementioned) and each of them, his true and lawful agent and proxy, with full power of substitution in each, to represent and
vote on behalf of the undersigned at the Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders of Acergy S.A. (the &#147;Company&#148;), to be held at the offices of SGG S.A., 412F, route d&#146;Esch, L-2086 Luxembourg on Tuesday November&nbsp;9, 2010 at
12:00 p.m. (local time) (the &#147;Meeting&#148;), and at any adjournments thereof, on all matters coming before the Meeting and any adjourned meeting. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>The Company&#146;s Board of Directors recommends that you vote in favour of both of the resolutions to be considered at the Meeting. </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">For Resolution 1 the quorum required is 50% of the outstanding shares, and to approve Resolution 1 a 2/3rd majority of the votes cast at the Meeting will
be required. In the event that the necessary quorum is not present at the Extraordinary General Meeting on November&nbsp;9, 2010, a subsequent meeting will be called, at which there will be no requirement for a quorum. All votes received from
beneficial holders of Acergy S.A. shares will remain valid for the purpose of any such subsequent meeting, unless shareholders indicate that they wish to alter their votes. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the event that you have sold your Acergy S.A. shares prior to receipt of this Notice, you are kindly requested to forward this Proxy Card, and the
accompanying documents, to the purchaser of your Acergy S.A. shares. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">No provision of Luxembourg law compulsorily requires the deposit and
blockage of shares by shareholders in order to attend and vote at a shareholders meeting or designate a proxy to do so. The Company&#146;s Articles provide for a record date system. </FONT></P>

<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Issue:</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Common:&nbsp;ADR&nbsp;ratio</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1 Common Share: 1 ADR</B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In accordance with
Section&nbsp;17 of the Deposit Agreement between Acergy S.A. (the &#147;Company&#148;) and Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, as Depositary (the &#147;Depositary&#148;), Acergy S.A. ADR holders (the &#147;Holders&#148;) are hereby notified of the
Company&#146;s Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders. A copy of the Notice of Meeting from the Company, which includes the agenda for such meeting, is enclosed. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Holders at the close of business on the ADR record date will be entitled, subject to any applicable law, the Company&#146;s Articles of Incorporation and
the provisions of or governing Deposited Property underlying ADRs, to instruct the Depositary as to the exercise of the voting rights, if any, pertaining to the Shares or other Deposited Property represented by ADRs. A voting instruction form is
enclosed for that purpose. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Upon receipt of a voting instruction from an ADR Holder on the ADR record date, received on or before the ADR
voting deadline, the Depositary shall endeavor, insofar as practicable and permitted under applicable law, the provisions of the Articles of Incorporation of the Company and the provisions of the Deposited Property underlying the ADRs, to vote or
cause the Custodian to vote the Shares and/or other Deposited Property, in person or by proxy, represented by the ADRs in accordance with the instructions set forth in such request. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Voting instructions may be given only in respect of a number of ADRs representing an integral number of Shares or other Deposited Property. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Neither the Depositary nor the Custodian shall under any circumstances exercise any discretion as to voting and neither the Depositary nor the Custodian
shall vote or attempt to exercise the right to vote Shares or other Deposited Property represented by ADRs except pursuant to and in accordance with such written instructions from Holders. Shares or other Deposited Property represented by ADRs for
which no specific voting instructions are received by the Depositary from the Holder shall not be voted. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the event of a postponement of
the Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders or a reconvening of a second meeting, all votes received from beneficial holders of Acergy S.A. ADRs will remain valid for the purposes of any such postponed or reconvened General Meeting.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>For further information, please contact: </B></FONT></P>

<TD VALIGN="top" COLSPAN="7"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B><U>Voting Recommendation:</U></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1">Acergy
S.A.&#146;s Board of Directors has reviewed and considered the terms and conditions of the Combination. Based on their review, the Board has determined that the Combination, and the transactions relating to it, are in the best interests of both
Acergy S.A. and its shareholders. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1">Consequently, the Board of Directors of Acergy S.A. unanimously recommends that shareholders vote in favour
of both of the resolutions which will be considered at the Meeting. The enclosed prospectus and the documents incorporated by reference herein contain information about Acergy and Subsea 7 and certain pro forma information on the Combined Group, as
well as the legal requirements for the implementation of the Combination. We encourage you to read the prospectus and these documents carefully before voting, including the section entitled &#145;Risk Factors&#146;. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B><U>Your vote is very important. The Company&#146;s Board of Directors recommends that you vote in favour of both of the resolutions to be considered
at the Meeting.</U> </B></FONT></P></DIV><br clear="All">

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>PROXY</B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ACERGY S.A.</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Proxy Solicited on behalf of the Board of Directors of the Company for</B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Extraordinary General Meeting November&nbsp;9, 2010</B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" align="left">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The undersigned hereby authorise DnB NOR Bank ASA
to constitute and appoint Sir Peter Mason KBE, Jean Cahuzac, Simon Crowe, Johan Rasmussen, Alistair Peel, Jean Hoss, Philippe Hoss, Chantal Mathu, or the Chairman of the Extraordinary General Meeting (if not one of the aforementioned) and each of
them, his true and lawful agent and proxy, with full power of substitution in each, to represent and vote on behalf of the undersigned at the Extraordinary General Meeting of Shareholders of Acergy S.A., to be held at the offices of SGG S.A., 412F,
route d'Esch, L-2086 Luxembourg on Tuesday, November&nbsp;9, 2010 at 12:00 p.m. (local time) (the &#147;Meeting&#148;), and at any adjournments thereof, on all matters coming before the Meeting and any adjourned meeting.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>The Board of Directors of the Company recommends that you vote in favour of the
proposals to be considered at the Meeting.</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the event that you have
sold your Acergy S.A. shares prior to receipt of this Notice, you are kindly requested to forward this Notice, and the accompanying documents, to the purchaser of your Acergy S.A. shares.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">No provision of Luxembourg law compulsorily requires the deposit and blockage of
shares by shareholders in order to attend and vote at a shareholders meeting or designate a proxy to do so. The Company&#146;s articles provide for a record date system.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(Continued and to be signed on the reverse
side)</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

and the initial term of the remaining directors to expire at the then following annual general meeting.</FONT></P></TD>

<TD VALIGN="top" COLSPAN="7"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B><U>Voting Recommendation:</U></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1">Acergy
S.A.&#146;s Board of Directors has reviewed and considered the terms and conditions of the Combination. Based on their review, the Board has determined that the Combination, and the transactions relating to it, are in the best interests of both
Acergy S.A. and its shareholders. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1">Consequently, the Board of Directors of Acergy S.A. unanimously recommends that shareholders vote in favour
of both of the resolutions which will be considered at the Meeting. The enclosed prospectus and the documents incorporated by reference herein contain information about Acergy and Subsea 7 and certain pro forma information on the Combined Group, as
well as the legal requirements for the implementation of the Combination. We encourage you to read the prospectus and these documents carefully before voting, including the section entitled &#145;Risk Factors&#146;. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><B><U>Your vote is very important. The Company&#146;s Board of Directors recommends that you vote in favour of both of the resolutions to be considered
at the Meeting.</U> </B></FONT></P></DIV><br clear="All">

<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 99.8 </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Prospectus dated September 21, 2010 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:24px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0">

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="46%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="9%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="45%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="center">


<IMG SRC="g101282g75d20.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" ALIGN="center">


<IMG SRC="g101282g66h52.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
</TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Acergy S.A. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">to be renamed </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="5">SUBSEA 7 S.A. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">following the Combination of </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Acergy S.A.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; and
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subsea 7 Inc. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Acergy
S.A., a <I>soci&eacute;t&eacute; anonyme</I> incorporated under the laws of the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg with registered office at 412F, route d&#146;Esch, L-2086 Luxembourg and registered with the <I>Registre de Commerce et des
Soci&eacute;t&eacute;s in</I> Luxembourg under number B 43 172 and Subsea 7 Inc., an exempted company incorporated under the laws of the Cayman Islands with registered office at the offices of Maples Corporate Services Limited, P.O. Box 309, South
Church Street, Grand Cayman, KY1-1104 Cayman Islands propose to their respective shareholders to combine the two groups. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Combination will
be effected through a Scheme of Arrangement under which Subsea 7 Inc. shareholders will receive New Acergy Shares against the contribution to Acergy S.A. of all the shares then outstanding in Subsea 7 Inc. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Combination will be conditional on<I>, inter alia</I>, the approval of the shareholders of each of Acergy S.A. and Subsea 7 Inc. and the sanction of
the Scheme of Arrangement by the Grand Court of the Cayman Islands, and certain competition clearances (see &#145;<I>VI. The Transaction</I>&#146;). </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Upon the Combination becoming effective, the Subsea 7 Inc. shareholders will receive New Acergy Shares in accordance with the Scheme Ratio subject to
certain terms described herein (see &#145;<I>VI. The Transaction</I>&#146;), Acergy S.A. will be renamed &#145;Subsea 7 S.A.&#146;, certain amendments of its Articles of Incorporation will take effect and its Board of Directors will be reconstituted
(see &#145;<I>XVI. Management and Employees</I>&#146;). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The New Acergy Shares will be listed on Oslo B&oslash;rs. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">This document constitutes a prospectus (in the form of a single document) for the purposes of Article 5 (3)&nbsp;of Directive 2003/71/EC and has been
prepared in accordance with the Luxembourg law of July&nbsp;10, 2005 relating to prospectuses for securities, as amended, and the rules promulgated thereunder. This prospectus has been filed with and approved by the Luxembourg <I>Commission de
Surveillance du Secteur Financier</I> (the &#145;CSSF&#146;) on September 21, 2010 for the purpose of the admission to trading and listing of the New Acergy Shares on Oslo B&oslash;rs. The CSSF will provide a notification of the approval, together
with a copy of the approved prospectus, to The Financial Supervisory Authority of Norway (<I>Finanstilsynet</I>) upon which this document will constitute a listing prospectus under Section 7-3 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Distribution of this prospectus may, in certain jurisdictions, be subject to specific regulations or restrictions. Persons and&nbsp;/or entities in
possession of this prospectus are urged to inform themselves of any such restrictions which may apply in their jurisdiction and to observe them. Acergy S.A. and Subsea 7 Inc. disclaim all responsibility for any violation of such restrictions by any
person. </FONT></P>

<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">XXV.</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><A HREF="#toc59275_25">ANNEXES</A></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">200</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>


<div style ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-TOP:1pt solid #000000;MARGIN-LEFT:0px;MARGIN-RIGHT:0px;WIDTH:100%"><div style="width:97%; margin-top:1.5%; margin-left:1.5%; margin-right:-1.25%">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><A NAME="toc59275_1"></A>I. SUMMARY </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>This summary highlights certain aspects of the Issuer&#146;s business and its Shares, but potential investors should read this entire prospectus,
including documents incorporated by reference herein and in particular the financial statements and accompanying notes contained by reference herein before making an investment decision. This summary should be read as an introduction to this
prospectus. Any decision to invest in the Shares should be based on this prospectus as a whole by the investor. Prospective investors should also carefully consider the information set forth in this prospectus under the heading &#145;II. Risk
Factors&#146;. Under the relevant provisions of the prospectus directive 2003/71/EC, no civil liability will attach to the responsible persons in any Member State of the European Economic Area solely on the basis of this summary, including any
translation thereof, unless it is misleading, inaccurate or inconsistent when read together with the other parts of this prospectus. Where a claim relating to the information contained in this prospectus is brought before a court in a Member State
of the European Economic Area, the plaintiff may, under the national legislation of the Member State where the claim is brought, be required to bear the costs of translating this prospectus before the legal proceedings are initiated. </I></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.1 Overview </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>1.1.1 General </I></B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Acergy S.A. and Subsea 7 Inc. have agreed in a business combination agreement (the &#145;Combination Agreement&#146;) to combine the businesses of the two
companies (the &#145;Combination&#146;, as described in this prospectus under &#145;<I>VI. The Transaction</I>&#146;). Under the terms of such Combination Agreement, Subsea 7 Inc. will become a wholly owned subsidiary of Acergy S.A. and Acergy S.A.
will be renamed &#145;Subsea&nbsp;7 S.A.&#146;. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Combination will be effected in the Cayman Islands through a scheme of arrangement
pursuant to which all the existing issued and outstanding shares in Subsea 7 Inc. will be repurchased and cancelled, the Scheme Shareholders will receive new Shares (the &#145;New Acergy Shares&#146;) and Acergy S.A. will receive the entirety of the
newly issued Subsea 7 Inc. shares (the &#145;Scheme of Arrangement&#146;). The Scheme of Arrangement is a court supervised process under Cayman Islands law. In Luxembourg, the Combination will be effected by the contribution in kind to Acergy S.A.
of all the new shares issued by Subsea 7 Inc. under the Scheme of Arrangement against the issuance to Subsea 7 Inc. shareholders of the New Acergy Shares. The Combination will result in Acergy S.A. holding all shares in Subsea 7 Inc. and the Subsea
7 Inc. shareholders receiving the New Acergy Shares. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>1.1.2 Acergy </I></B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Acergy is a leading offshore engineering, construction, and maintenance (&#145;OECM&#146;) company, working for oil and gas companies worldwide. It
operates in the market for engineering, project management, procurement, fabrication, installation, construction, commissioning and maintenance of offshore pipelines, fixed surface production facilities and associated infrastructure. Acergy
generated revenue of $2,209 million and a gross profit of $525 million from continuing operations for the fiscal year 2009. For the first half of fiscal year 2010 revenue from continuing operations was $1,157 million and gross profit $310 million.
Backlog for Acergy&#146;s continuing operations as at May&nbsp;31, 2010 was approximately $2.3 billion, of which approximately $0.9 billion is expected to be executed in the fiscal year 2010. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Acergy S.A., is a public limited liability company (&#145;<I>soci&eacute;t&eacute; anonyme</I>&#146;) organised and existing under the laws of the Grand
Duchy of Luxembourg, having its registered office at 412F, route d&#146;Esch, L-2086 Luxembourg, Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, registered with the <I>Registre de Commerce et des Soci&eacute;t&eacute;s</I> in Luxembourg under number B 43 172,
incorporated pursuant to a deed of Ma&icirc;tre Paul Frieders, notary residing at the time in Luxembourg, Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, on March&nbsp;10, 1993, published in the <I>M&eacute;morial C, Recueil des Soci&eacute;t&eacute;s et
Associations</I> on April&nbsp;28, 1993, number 190. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Acergy S.A. Shares trade in the form of ADSs in the United States on the NASDAQ
Global Select Market, currently under the symbol &#145;ACGY&#146; and as from the first trading day following Completion is anticipated to be under the symbol &#145;SUBC&#146;. They are also listed in Norway on Oslo B&oslash;rs, currently under the
symbol &#145;ACY&#146; and as from the first trading day following Completion is anticipated to be under the symbol &#145;SUBC&#146;. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
</div></div>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>


<div style ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-TOP:1pt solid #000000;MARGIN-LEFT:0px;MARGIN-RIGHT:0px;WIDTH:100%"><div style="width:97%; margin-top:1.5%; margin-left:1.5%; margin-right:-1.25%">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>1.1.3 Subsea 7 </I></B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Subsea 7 is a global subsea contractor within the oil and gas industry with assets around the world, including onshore assets (such as offices, pipeline
welding spool bases and fabrication facilities) and vessels. Subsea 7 performs total subsea field projects and provides design, engineering, construction, installation and maintenance of facilities for the subsea production of oil and gas. Subsea 7
generated revenue of $2,439 million and a net profit attributable to equity shareholders of $288 million for the fiscal year 2009. Revenue from continuing operations for the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2010 was $973 million and net profit
attributable to equity shareholders for that period was $78 million. Backlog for Subsea 7&#146;s continuing operations as at June&nbsp;30, 2010 was approximately $2.8 billion, of which approximately $0.9 billion is expected to be executed in the
fiscal year 2010. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Subsea 7 Inc. is a company incorporated under the laws of the Cayman Islands with registered number MC-115107 and with
registered offices at the offices of Maples Corporate Services Limited, PO Box 309, South Church Street, Grand Cayman, KY1-1104, Cayman Islands. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Subsea 7 Inc.&#146;s shares are listed on Oslo B&oslash;rs under the symbol &#145;SUB&#146;. Following Completion, Subsea 7 Inc.&#146;s shares are
expected to be de-listed from Oslo B&oslash;rs. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.2 Reasons for the Combination </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Acergy S.A. and Subsea 7 Inc. believe that the Combination will create a global leader in seabed-to-surface engineering and construction with a presence
in all major offshore oil and gas regions and the ability to provide clients a step-change in service offering. This includes engineering, fabrication, procurement, installation and commissioning services for Subsea Umbilical, Riser and Flowline
(SURF) projects, Conventional Field Development projects, Conventional Refurbishment projects and Life-of-Field services (including Inspection, Repair and Maintenance, Survey and Decommissioning). It is the combined view of Acergy S.A. and Subsea 7
Inc. that the Combination is an excellent strategic fit for both companies, with industry fundamentals strongly supporting the logic of the Combination. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Combination is expected to allow the Combined Group to better meet the growing size and technical complexity of offshore projects and to be well
positioned to take advantage of future growth opportunities globally. The complementary fit of the different strengths and the enhanced operational capability should allow the Combined Group to deliver enhanced long-term value. The Combined Group
will be able to provide a full spectrum of offshore services for clients, utilising its enlarged and diversified fleet of 42 vessels, supported by extensive fabrication and onshore facilities, access to a greater depth of project management,
engineering and technical expertise, together with its access to high value technologies. The Combined Group will have a stronger balance sheet and should be better able to deliver efficiencies, including those arising from efficiencies of scale,
capital deployment and optimisation of fleet schedules. As a result, the Combined Group should be better able to meet the growing size and technical complexity of offshore projects, driven by the demand to access ever more remote reserves in
increasingly harsh and challenging environments. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The excellent strategic fit of the different strengths of each company positions the
Combined Group to deliver enhanced long-term value for all stakeholders. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Acergy and Subsea 7 believe that the Combination will give rise to
substantial operating cost and vessel fleet synergies. These synergies are expected to deliver at least $100 million per annum from operating cost and vessel fleet synergies within three years of Completion. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.3 The Scheme Ratio </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Acergy S.A. will
issue New Acergy Shares to the shareholders of Subsea 7 Inc. on the basis of the Scheme Ratio which operates as follows: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) in consideration for the repurchase and cancellation of all the Subsea 7 Inc. shares and the issuance of new Subsea 7
Inc. shares to Acergy S.A., each Subsea 7 Inc. shareholder will receive 1.065 New Acergy Shares (except as set out in (b)&nbsp;and (c)&nbsp;below) to be issued by the Issuer as fully paid up shares which will be free from all encumbrances for each
Scheme Share held at the Scheme Record Time; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) however, no fractions of New Acergy Shares will be allotted
to Subsea 7 Inc. shareholders. Instead, any and all fractional shares in Acergy S.A. which the Subsea 7 Inc. shareholders would </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
</div></div>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>


<div style ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-TOP:1pt solid #000000;MARGIN-LEFT:0px;MARGIN-RIGHT:0px;WIDTH:100%"><div style="width:97%; margin-top:1.5%; margin-left:1.5%; margin-right:-1.25%">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
otherwise have been entitled to will be aggregated (the total number of such fractions being the &#145;Aggregated Fractional Number&#146;) and sold in the market as soon as practicable following
the Scheme Record Time and the net proceeds of sale shall be paid in cash to each relevant Subsea 7 Inc. shareholder on a pro-rata basis; </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) in order to prevent an over dilution of the existing Acergy S.A. shareholders, the number of New Acergy Shares to be
allotted to the Subsea 7 Inc. shareholders cannot exceed 99.99% of the aggregate number of Acergy S.A. shares in issue prior to the Scheme Record Time (the &#145;Maximum Issue Number&#146;). In the event that the number of the New Acergy Shares to
be issued to the Subsea 7 Inc. shareholders, together with the Aggregated Fractional Number exceeds the Maximum Issue Number, then the Subsea 7 Inc. shareholders&#146; entitlement to receive New Acergy Shares will be reduced to the Maximum Issue
Number on a pro-rata basis. The Subsea 7 Inc. shareholders will then receive cash payments in lieu of the New Acergy Shares they would otherwise have received together with a pro-rata cash payment in respect of any fractional shares, which will have
been aggregated and sold in the market. The total cash payment in lieu of the New Acergy Shares will be calculated as (i)&nbsp;the theoretical number of New Acergy Shares to be issued as a result of the Scheme Ratio calculation, less the Maximum
Issue Number, multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;the volume weighted average share price of Acergy S.A. shares, in NOK, on Oslo B&oslash;rs for the ten trading days prior to the effective day of Completion. A US dollar equivalent of the cash payment will be
offered, converted using the prevalent USD:NOK closing rate on the date of Completion. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.4 Key Steps for the Combination </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In order to complete the Combination the following key steps will need to be implemented under Cayman Islands law and Luxembourg law as applicable. For
further details see &#145;<I>VI. The Transaction</I>&#146;. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">An extraordinary general meeting of shareholders of Acergy S.A. will be convened
in order to approve the Combination and certain related items. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">An extraordinary general meeting and a Court Meeting of the Subsea 7 Inc.
shareholders will be convened to approve the Subsea Resolutions and the Scheme of Arrangement respectively. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">If the extraordinary general
meeting of shareholders of Acergy S.A. is not quorate, a second meeting of Acergy S.A.&#146;s shareholders will need to be held in order to approve the Combination. In that case, the extraordinary general meeting of the Subsea 7 Inc. shareholders
and the Court Meeting in the Cayman Islands will also be adjourned. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Board of Directors of Acergy S.A. will resolve the issuance of the
New Acergy Shares as previously authorised by the Acergy Combination EGM. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Provided Acergy S.A. shareholders approve the Combination and
certain related items and provided the Subsea 7 Inc. shareholders approve the Subsea Resolutions and the Scheme of Arrangement at the above mentioned meetings, the Cayman Islands Court will be asked to make a Court Order to sanction the Scheme of
Arrangement (&#145;Cayman Court Order&#146;). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Once all conditions of the Combination are satisfied, Subsea 7 Inc. will file the Cayman Court
Order with the Cayman Islands Registrar of Companies. The Scheme of Arrangement will then become effective on its terms and the Combination will become effective at 6.00 pm Oslo time on the day the Cayman Court Order is filed. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.5 Risk Factors </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Combined
Group&#146;s business, financial condition or results of operations could be materially adversely affected by the following risks: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Market Risks </I></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Combined Group&#146;s business is affected by expenditure by participants in the oil and gas industry. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Combined Group will face competition both for contracts and for resources. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>

<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>


<div style ="BORDER-BOTTOM:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-LEFT:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-RIGHT:1pt solid #000000;BORDER-TOP:1pt solid #000000;MARGIN-LEFT:0px;MARGIN-RIGHT:0px;WIDTH:100%"><div style="width:97%; margin-top:1.5%; margin-left:1.5%; margin-right:-1.25%">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The offshore oil and gas operations of the Combined Group could be adversely impacted by certain consequences of the Macondo drilling rig accident and
resulting oil spill. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Strategic Risks </I></B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Combined Group&#146;s international operations will be exposed to political, social and economic instability in the developing countries in which
it operates, and other risks inherent in international business. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Combined Group is exposed to substantial hazards, risks and delays, the resulting liabilities of which may potentially exceed insurance coverage
and contractual indemnity provisions. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Combined Group must continuously improve technology and equipment to compete for business and avoid asset write-downs.
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:18px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Operational Risks </I></B></FONT></P>

shareholders, certain closing conditions and the receipt of consents </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Following Completion, the Combined Group may be unable to successfully integrate Acergy&#146;s and Subsea 7&#146;s businesses, which could result in
the Combined Group&#146;s failure to realise anticipated cost savings, revenue enhancements and other benefits expected from the Combination. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
